subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में कौन सा मंदिर है?
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort is a famous fort located in Jodhpur, built by Rao Jodha in the 1555 CE. It is known for its intricate carvings and beautiful architecture.
explanation_hi: मेरंगर्घ Fort, built by Rao Jodha in 1555 AD, is a famous fort located in Jodhpur. It is renowned for its intricate carvings and stunning architecture.
